tags.name: dropdown-select
tags.description:
`dropdown-select`

Events:

  * `change` - 

  * `open` - 

  * `close` - 

  * `value-changed` - 

  * `dropdown-select-changed` - 

Attributes:

  * `error-message` {`string`} - The error message to display when invalid.

  * `placeholder` {`string`} - The placeholder for the dropdown.

  * `selected-item` - The last selected item.

  * `vertical-offset` {`number`} - Overrides the vertical offset computed in
_computeMenuVerticalOffset.

  * `allow-outside-scroll` {`boolean`} - 

  * `always-float-label` {`boolean`} - Set to true to always float the label.

  * `dynamic-align` {`boolean`} - If true, the `horizontalAlign` and `verticalAlign` properties will
be considered preferences instead of strict requirements when
positioning the dropdown and may be changed if doing so reduces
the area of the dropdown falling outside of `fitInto`.

  * `horizontal-align` {`string`} - The orientation against which to align the menu dropdown
horizontally relative to the dropdown trigger.

  * `label` {`string`} - The label of the select menu

  * `no-animations` {`boolean`} - Set to true to disable animations when opening and closing the
dropdown.

  * `no-label-float` {`boolean`} - Set to true to disable the floating label.

  * `opened` {`boolean`} - True if the dropdown is open. Otherwise, false.

  * `restore-focus-on-close` {`boolean`} - Whether focus should be restored to the dropdown when the menu closes.

  * `selected-item-index` {`number`} - The index of the selected item

  * `selected-item-label` {`string`} - The label of the selected item

  * `value` {`string`} - The default value

  * `vertical-align` {`string`} - The orientation against which to align the menu dropdown
vertically relative to the dropdown trigger.

Properties:

  * `errorMessage` {`string`} - The error message to display when invalid.

  * `placeholder` {`string`} - The placeholder for the dropdown.

  * `selectedItem` - The last selected item.

  * `verticalOffset` {`number`} - Overrides the vertical offset computed in
_computeMenuVerticalOffset.

  * `allowOutsideScroll` {`boolean`} - 

  * `alwaysFloatLabel` {`boolean`} - Set to true to always float the label.

  * `dynamicAlign` {`boolean`} - If true, the `horizontalAlign` and `verticalAlign` properties will
be considered preferences instead of strict requirements when
positioning the dropdown and may be changed if doing so reduces
the area of the dropdown falling outside of `fitInto`.

  * `horizontalAlign` {`string`} - The orientation against which to align the menu dropdown
horizontally relative to the dropdown trigger.

  * `label` {`string`} - The label of the select menu

  * `noAnimations` {`boolean`} - Set to true to disable animations when opening and closing the
dropdown.

  * `noLabelFloat` {`boolean`} - Set to true to disable the floating label.

  * `opened` {`boolean`} - True if the dropdown is open. Otherwise, false.

  * `restoreFocusOnClose` {`boolean`} - Whether focus should be restored to the dropdown when the menu closes.

  * `selectedItemIndex` {`number`} - The index of the selected item

  * `selectedItemLabel` {`string`} - The label of the selected item

  * `value` {`string`} - The default value

  * `verticalAlign` {`string`} - The orientation against which to align the menu dropdown
vertically relative to the dropdown trigger.
